name: playwright-cucumber-report-portal

scripts.tag-login: npm run test -- --tags "@login and not (@wip or @manual)"
scripts.tag-login:positive: npm run test -- --tags "@login and @positive and not (@wip or @manual)"
scripts.tag-login:negative: npm run test -- --tags "@login and @negative and not (@wip or @manual)"
scripts.test-project-in-command-mobile-chrome: cross-env PROJECT="Mobile Chrome" npm run test
